segments.text: Which university did you graduate from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What was your major at university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I studied economics , I am especially interested in the economic development of China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What course did you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like Business Management , and i think it's very useful for the present work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think is the relationship between the subjects you've taken and the job you are seeking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've taken courses on office administration , reports and correspondence writing . I think all these are closely related to the job of assistant manager , because it requires the ability to perform general office work and to assist the manager in handling all paperwork .
segments.speaker: S2
